title: MindKits Storefront API
description: Access product data, variants, inventory, and curated lists from the MindKits online store.

getProducts.description: Get all products. Supports pagination and filters like ?page=1&per_page=20

getProductById.description: Get detailed info for a product by ID.

getProductLists.description: Get curated product lists with product IDs.

getVariantInventoryByProductId.description: Get variant inventory for a product.

getProductStatuses.description: Get product statuses like 'Stocked', 'Out of Stock', etc.

getProductPictures.description: Get product pictures for a given product ID.

getProductPricing.description: Get pricing info for a product.
